channel.title: I honestly think it's a shame that Half Life: Decay is pretty much forgotten...
channel.description: I thought it was kinda fun when it came out...

item.title: I honestly think it's a shame that Half Life: Decay is pretty much forgotten...
item.dc:creator: Superbanjo64
item.description:
Torpede:

it is a blessing it was forgotten so valve wouldn’t be remembered for making a mediocre game like that.

Valve didn’t make it…Gearbox did…

item.title: I honestly think it's a shame that Half Life: Decay is pretty much forgotten...
item.dc:creator: Torpede
item.description:
removing the weapon from the hud was a bad idea in multiplayer. and singleplayer fails because you have to go everywhere twice cause you’re moving both characters.

it is a blessing it was forgotten so valve wouldn’t be remembered for making a mediocre game like that.

item.source: I honestly think it's a shame that Half Life: Decay is pretty much forgotten...

item.title: I honestly think it's a shame that Half Life: Decay is pretty much forgotten...
item.dc:creator: Grey_Acumen
item.description:
You can play Decay with just single player, lan, or online. I’ve successfully set up a server myself, and even have unlocked the bonus level where you play as Vortigons. The only problem is that there’s not really anyone else to play it with, if either player dies it’s game over for both, and there’s no way to save in the middle of a level.

Read full topic

I tryed playing the PC port of Decay but I think I had a problem switching between players or something like that. What ever it was it ment I couldnt get past the first lvl.

It’s meant for LAN, you know…

item.title: I honestly think it's a shame that Half Life: Decay is pretty much forgotten...
item.dc:creator: morg1985
item.description:
sersoft:

I bet everyone has a copy of PSM Issue 57 with Jango Fett on the cover.

The chances of anyone still owning that are quite low but you’d only need the disc because the code is there on the net.

I bet someone out there has still got an old pile of demo discs with that issue included.:retard:

ALSO: here’s a thumbnail picture that my jog a memory or two.

Read full topic
item.source: I honestly think it's a shame that Half Life: Decay is pretty much forgotten...

item.title: I honestly think it's a shame that Half Life: Decay is pretty much forgotten...
item.dc:creator: hypnotek
item.description:
I actually enjoyed decay, and I used it to introduce my father to Half life. While it was just the two of us in the house for the week, I loaded it onto both our computers and We both really enjoyed it. I just like to think of it as the predecessor to Sven Co-Op and Synergy.

item.description:

item.title: I honestly think it's a shame that Half Life: Decay is pretty much forgotten...
item.dc:creator: Ballsopt
item.description:
The gameplay was a bit tedious i felt, but there were some really cool sequences, like the Medical facility housing dissected Xen creatures, and the massive convoy of Gunships flying en route to the facility, heralding the HECU intervention.

item.source: I honestly think it's a shame that Half Life: Decay is pretty much forgotten...

item.title: I honestly think it's a shame that Half Life: Decay is pretty much forgotten...
item.dc:creator: Torpede
item.description:
split-screen co-op, lol. and i thought i failed, especially with a game like half-life where your FOV is so low. It made enemies look like the size of bowser in a mario side-scroller. They also removed your weapon from the HUD when playing co-op.

Read full topic
item.source: I honestly think it's a shame that Half Life: Decay is pretty much forgotten...

item.title: I honestly think it's a shame that Half Life: Decay is pretty much forgotten...
item.dc:creator: Superbanjo64
item.description:
Torpede:

i thought it sucked. it wasn’t as immersive as other half-life games like OF or BS

I played it for one reason…and one reason alone…

IT’S…FUCKING…HALF LIFE…CO-OP…

we wouldn’t see anything like that untill the mod Sven Co-op came out…
